about-me-details-first-paragraph: Hi, I am a Frontend Developer based in Munich. My passion is creating dynamic websites and web-apps with high-end user experience.
about-me-details-second-paragraph: My positions in adult education and e-learning technology have sharpened my understanding of human-computer interactions.
about-me-details-third-paragraph: I'm convinced that software development is more than just coding. It must manage the interests of various stakeholders in a holistic approach. I learned this by working in interdisciplinary teams in the past.
